Html:
Hi!

First, thanks for that great piece of software.

In WindowsForm, if GetPlacemark returns the status 620 - G_GEO_TOO_MANY_QUERIES, GMap record that result in cache.

So if you put the thread in sleep for 500 ms and than the query is repeated, I get the same status of 620 from the cache and the application could enter in infinite loop.

I think that result with 620 status code should not be cached.
